code:
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,  // Clock signal, positive edge-triggered
    input logic rst,  // Synchronous reset, active high
    input logic a,    // One-bit input
    output logic q    // One-bit output, registered
);

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (rst) begin
            q <= 1'b0;  // Reset state
        end else begin
            if (a) begin
                q <= 1'b0;  // Set q to 0 when a is 1
            end else begin
                q <= 1'b1;  // Maintain q as 1 when a is 0
            end
        end
    end

endmodule
[DONE]

iterations.code:
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,  // Clock signal, positive edge-triggered
    input logic a,    // One-bit input
    output logic q    // One-bit output, registered
);

    logic state;  // Internal state to hold the value of q

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (a) begin
            state <= 0;  // Set state to 0 when a is 1
        end else begin
            state <= 1;  // Maintain state as 1 when a is 0
        end
    end

    assign q = state;  // Assign the internal state to output q

endmodule
issues: Numeric constants should have explicit size (e.g., 1'b0 not 0)
